reviews.review: I have dined here multiple times and this place has never disappointed!! The staff is very friendly, the food is delicious and in recent times, they have also taken measures to ensure a safe dining experience (indoor and outdoor).
Very delicious and authentic Indian food. Nice and friendly service, fresh and hot food, great variety, value for money, awesome taste and overall very good food. Would definitely recommend it.

Food was delicious
We ordered meal lunch the quantity was a lot
It is better to order one lunch for 2

The food was horrible horrible !
We have tasted their food from other NY locations last year and it was soo good !
They are using chefs who have absolutely no knowledge of cooking .
Extremely dissatisfied.
Will not recommend to anyone .

I absolutely loved Saravanaa Bhavan. It gives you the authentic taste of South Indian food. Ordered Utthapams and Filter coffee with papadums. When torn for choices between South Indian food joints, pick this place anyday. The waiting time to get seats here is a bit more so be prepared but it's worth the wait.
More people should know about this spot. The dosas are delicious year after year.
Delicious south indian staples at affordable prices. Been twice in the past month.

The food was just amazing! Typical South Indian taste. As someone from Tamil Nadu, I’m always in search of the South Indian cuisine. Found this restaurant near my university. The food tastes the same as the ones at SB in Chennai. Had Sambar Vada, Rava Masala Dosa and Filter coffee. The waitress Rabina did her work perfectly!
Great experience! The food and the customer service over here is awesome. Mr Vijay is very friendly and helpful. It was a delightful experience.

Very cool place with authentic Indian dishes. If u like exploring new things and cultures - this is a must try! We actually went back a second time even though Indian cuisine isn't my favorite. Just cause of the amazing experience we had there. Staff if extremely nice! One waited have us a dessert free of charge to try out!! O definitely recommend this place!!
Good south indian food. They have some outside seating currently.
Good quality south India vegetarian food.  I feel good after eating there.
Ordered take away and it was super delicious. Hooked on this place and looking forward to my next order!

Don't listen to the haters. This place has excellent Indian food. Even though it's vegetarian I don't feel like I'm missing anything. Their Palak Paneer is way better than other Indian restaurants in the area.
Cheese Masala dosa was good. But the best were ghee mini idlis. Little morsels of heaven 😀

Great vegetarian spot in UWS. Their spinach based dishes are really well made. The paneer is also cooked to a point where there is a light burn but not crispy. The thali (special dish on the menu) can probably feed two.

I’ve taken a few people here and will keep coming back for more!

FOOD
-Paper masala dosa (pictured below) has been my go-to. The bread is deliciously chewy towards the center with a nice crunch towards the edges. The dips keep the flavors interesting and have a mild spice here and there
- Garlic naan comes in 4 pieces and is deliciously garlicky and fresh. The bread was straight out of the oven and into the basket. Would recommend this staple if you’re craving and if you will have enough space for the dosa!
- Coffee is creamy and delightful! It really hit the spot at the end of the meal. It’s quite strong, so I wouldn’t advise if it’s late in the day and you are sensitive to caffeine

AMBIANCE
- Decent dining area that’s very clean! The staff wipes down the tables and chairs after every group
- It can get a bit crowded, but it is a popular space after all!
- Only downside is there is no AC. There are a few large fans, but if you aren’t one of the tables that are downwind, then you are out of luck!

SERVICE
- The servers are very friendly, but unfortunately very very busy (and possibly understaffed)!
- It generally takes time to get seated as they wipe everything down and get set up. You need to be comfortable flagging down waiters for the menu and for water (and clarifying if everyone at the table wants water as well)
- The food takes a bit of time, but it’s reasonable considering how the dosas are fresh! Just be prepared for a nice chat with your companions!
Food was good. Paper masala dosa was nice and Veg biryani was Ok.
Good South Indian food on the UWS. Been visiting them for years!
Great experience! The food and the customer service over here is awesome. Mr Vijay is very friendly and helpful. It was a delightful experience. Will definitely visit again.

They made good food even better! Went in May 2020 and Thali veg was DALISH. I loved small okra nuggets. Fave was raita fresh, with red onions. Included potato masala, chickpea curry.. more. The food was served outside in take out containers and all was super clean and we felt safe. And got to take home leftovers.
Had a great time at Saravanaa Bhavan all thanks to Vijay! The food tastes even better when you have good people around. Will definitely come back again.

Serves classic south Indian staple food. I tried the masala dosa & filter coffee here and both were pretty good. Service is decent but a bit slow. Definitely recommend to check it out if you want to try some Indian food other than Chicken Tikka Masala & the kind.
The closest thing to Indian food I had in India! Everything was delicious

Food was really good and consistent quality.

However, space management is poor. The furniture and the way it's laid out is not fit for the tight space. Staff seemed distracted and were not great with maximizing table turnover during rush hour.

Always like the food here. My go to for South Indian. Ordered filter coffee this time around and it came with burnt milk. Had to send it back. Staff was nice to get it made again, fresh. Hygiene is not the best. The water glass had lipstick stains and that got me a bit uncomfortable with their silverware.

Casual spot. Dosas here are delicious! Service can be slow though, because there are a lot of takeout orders. We were a group of 8 and our fishes did not come out at the same time at all. But everything was tasty.
The food was very tasty! Felt like traditional South Indian food. We also met Vijay and he was very fun and entertaining! Excellent experience!
The foods are really good Vijay hosted us very nicely. Really had a great lunch time with friends. Will definitely come back again next time.
This place was awesome! Vijay, our waiter was cheerful, kind and overall really good. Great recommendations and great food. Definitely will come back!
Great food and great service  !!

I don’t understand the ethics of this business. Manager was asking too personal questions so he could determine the type of respect or a service that they could provide??Found dirt in the water then I asked to have a clean warm water but in return guess what I got: Server went and open the tap and bought the hot water that comes with the chlorine from the tap instead of getting it from the boiler (such a lazy bummer) as I have uploaded a picture to see the service was terrible. The chef was staring at us from the window while we were having our dinner so can you please teach your employees some manners and decency??? This is not wherever they come from. Please have some manners we are living in a civilized country forsake!!!
The food was great and they give very large portions. Vijay was our server. He was amazing! Overall very good service and experience.

Me and my buddy stopped here for south indian food and it was awesome. Good hospitality and especially the guy Lincoln at the the front desk was very helpful. Really nice experience and will definitely come back if I cm here ever...5** for you guys..

It was one of the best South Indian meal I had outside India. The place had a warm, homely feeling and the waiters were very friendly. Ask for Vijay, he’s the best and will make sure you feel at home and are well fed! Must go.

The best South Indian food I have ever had outside of India! Only in New York for a few days and this one certainly one of the highlights. Our server Vijay was very kind, talkative and welcoming. Will definitely be coming back on my next trip!
Ordered the Kara Dosa. The filing tasted like Maggie Masala and wasn't that great. The only good food there was the Kesari Rawa (sooji halwa) 😍 if you have a sweet tooth, then you must try it.

From the first moment  you enter this place  team give you a pleasant feeling. Very congenial crew, it is a nice restaurant to go out with friends or with your date. Excellent  food, specialist  chef de cuisine, modest  cost and attentive  service. Warmly recommended.

Absolutely fantastic experience. The food was amazing and the service was impeccable. Vijay was our server and he was absolutely phenomenal, I will 100% be back here. Can’t recommend this restaurant more 10/10.
Delicious dosas. Delicious parotas. I would've given a 4 star but thanks to the hospitality of Mr. Vijay, I'm giving 5 stars!
Vijay was so nice! Amazing service and great food. Would definitely recommend and come back

The food was some of the most delicious Indian food I have ever had. The service was very good and the people were very lovely. Vijay was very lovely and nice. The entire experience was amazing and I really recommend this place.
Love this place. And Vijay is a very attentive waiter. Food is delicious and healthy!! I always get the lunch special.

Expensive South Indian food restaurant. Except idly, quality of rest of the menu items is not consistent, if you are lucky you might get decent taste, else bad luck! Attached Burnt Mirchi Bajji and Burnt Plaintan Bajji (nothing like authentic south Indian bajji)  Google search for actual look of bajjis.

Authentic south indian food experience in New york city. This place offers a wide variety of south indian dishes similar to it's food chain back in India. The dishes are on the expensive side but the taste is worth it.
Great place for authentic south Indian vegetarian food
Wonderful food that brings good memories of home. Clean place and good quantity. Mr. Vijay was very friendly and helpful!
Tasty food with excellent service by Mr. Vijay. Missed home food badly, but this place gave us the authentic taste of home food for us again. Really loved this place, will visit again for sure!

Had a wonderful time second time here with colleagues. Staff was very friendly, thanks Vijay for an excellent experience. Food was fantastic as the first time. Highly recommend to visit for authentic Vegitarien Indian Cuisine.

The hospitality was very nice. Also, make sure you ask for Vijay! He's the sweetest guy and made sure that we were not short of anything.

The food was sumptuous. A must visit for South Indian food when in NYC!
Amazing experience! The food is lovely and the service is very homely. Vijay really treats you like his own family.

The food here was excellent, and the service doubly so - we were waited on by a very friendly man named Vijay. He was kind, courteous, helping to take pictures of us, and was very attentive (without being intrusive). The place was clean and orderly. Reiterating once again the food was delicious, some of the best Indian food I’ve had in months.
Great food and excellent service! Vijay was awesome and super friendly!  He’ll definitely take care of you!  Go now!  If I could give ten stars I would!

The food is very consistent here, and very good.  The atmosphere is not, nor is the service. It's Kosher, so it must be clean.  If it was not, I would not eat here.  As it stands, we come back regularly, as the food is unique (in our limited experience) and we enjoy it.

I took my girlfriend who was visiting from Toronto to this location. She is an avid lover of South Indian food. But what was amazing here was our server Vijay, he went above and beyond in his service. He is professional with a personal touch of his own style of service. It felt like home. He is an absolute asset to this location. exceptional!
Excellent South Indian food. Must visit if you are looking for authentic vegetarian food in NYC. Reasonably priced and we were served by Vijay who was very warm and friendly.
Home food was not missed. Thank you, Mr. Vijay for making us feel right at home with your hospitality! The food is amazing and the presentation - top notch! Definitely worth another visit!

This is my go-to spot for a casual celebratory dinner! Delicious yet simple, and unbelievably potent (try the tomato chili onion Uthappam and you’ll know what I mean). Also, Indian desert is the best thing on the planet - get the Halwa!

And did I mentioned the prices are more than reasonable?
Vijay is very nice and passionate about his service. Definitely check it out for yourself. Food is great too!

Really amazing place with great food...
Vijay makes the experience even more mesmerizing...
And don't forget to have the filter coffee...
Amazing Masala Dosa and tea. It tastes like the dosa during my stay in south india :) Furthermore you can sit outside and enjoy the evening.
Ah I come here when I miss South Indian food!! Reminds me of home :) Vijay is great! The poori’s are awesome:
Amazing food and fun atmosphere! Service was incredible and friendly ask for Vijay, he will take care of you. This is my new favorite spot!
It is always a pleasure to visit this place for the food and the service. Mr vijay ensured that me and my friends have a great time and experience since it was their 1st time!
Amazing food. Great Service. Appreciate Vijay's service for attending to our table! Cheers!
Vijay was excellent and very helpful. The food was great. Our orders were brought out on time and delicious.

My second visit to Saravanaa Bhavan NY, with my friend. Liked the food, and of course the Madras Filter Coffee in tumbler/ davraa. The hospitality of the staff was good, especially Vijay Anna. He made us feel home. I will go back sometime soon!
This is an amazing place! Vijay is delightful, and the food is exquisite. We'll be back soon!
Authentic food. Hygienic and clean space. Friendly staff members like Vijay further enhance the dining experience. He shared his experience about the city and his travel experiences.

Excellent South Indian food. Even better filter coffee! Reminds me of home!

Thanks for the warm welcome, Vijay!
Great food and great service! Vijay was our server and he is very helpful and nice. I will be returning very soon.

Authentic. Menu is comprehensive. Servers are around. Food’s very good!

Seating is cramped so beware with bringing large crowds.
Amazing ambience!! The food was absolutely amazing — Vijay provided us with great service and made our night. Highly recommended!
Excellent food, favourite Indian neighbourhood spot! The service is incredible. Vijay is always an amazing host and makes it a memorable experience!
Vijay, our server, was very friendly and efficient. The food was delicious and the restaurant was clean. Overall, a great experience!
Very nice food and authentic taste. We tasted several items and everything was well prepared. Dosas are absolute best with several chutneys. Staff was courteous and friendly. Must try ☕ as well.
Loved this place for dinner, so fresh and good!! Had the best Chai in the city.. Vijay was also so awesome and great energy. Ask for him, and totally recommend this place. Thank you!!!
Vijay was an amazing waiter. Constantly checked up on us and made sure everything was good. Good service and amazing experience all around.

Food and service were amazing! Really excellent.

Only downside was the manager literally pressuring me and my cousin DURING the meal to leave a review. Sorry, that is unacceptable.
Fantastic meal! Very friendly staff, thanks Vijay for a wonderful evening!

Great place! Very authentic dosas. The servers are very friendly and sweet especially Vijay. Makes me want to come back just to say hello to him! Love this place and have been coming  for years and will continue to do so!
Good hospitality. Great food. For about $20 per person, good value. They also have outdoor seating which is nice for a sunny day.
Loved the service! Super Lively place with an amazing ambience! Ask for vijay! He’s cool

I have been to Saravanaa Bhavan at Lexington many times and it's my first time to come to this location. Food is amazing and the ambience is wonderful. Vijay is a fantastic customer service and nice. Highly recommended!

Very good south Indian food. Excellent hospitality , especially five stars for server Mr Vijay who was very quick in attending  to our orders at the restaurant and had a welcoming smile all the time which helps keep up the vibe of the restaurant lively .

Awesome food and wonderful service by vijay🔥🔥. Quick, friendly and soothing service by vijay which really gave the necessary energy that we needed for the day. Was really missing the south Indian cuisine for a long time and today they made my day. ❤️😁
This is the most authentic spot for Indian food in NYC. Really love the dosa and more traditional South Indian fare. Vijay provided us with amazing service. Highly recommend.

One of the best places in the city, had the best time here. The food was amazing and just like India. It's a must visit for anyone craving Indian food in NYC. Loved Mr. Vijay's service and hospitality!

Brilliant South Indian food on the Upper West Side! I'm a frequent customer here and I love the South Indian Thali. It's a steal on weekdays at 13 bucks. Also, my man Vijay is an amazing guy! Make sure to meet him; he's got some great stories.
It’s a wonderful restaurant and a good option for vegetarian people. Vijay is super friendly and I definitely recommend it.
Great authentic south Indian food, true to the original South Indian brand. Great service as well. Mr. Vijay was really friendly and caring. Highly recommend!
Great food!! and service by Vijay. Will definitely go back again :)
amazing food and great service! Vijay had great recommendations too. Will be back!!
Tasty food. Below average ambience. Very small dining area.
Excellent service from Vijay! We usually go to the other SB downtown but we’ll go here to the one on Amsterdam from now on. Great food-great price and excellent service! 5 stars⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Best service ever from vijay! Made me feel like im back home :)
Amazing lunch. Definitely try the mini meals, a whole range of Indian food available at a great price. Vijay was great fun and kept us entertained throughout the meal.

Vijay was so kind and served us so well throughout our lunch. Would definitely come back to just hang with Vijay! The food was amazing too, so that was a plus.
Thank you, Vijay!

Amazing service, Vijay is super and friendly  - and a go to man for friendly service.
Any one who thinks of authentic South Indian veg cuisine - should definitely visit this place.
Had a great experience tonight with Mr. Vijay. He was very friendly, courteous and warm. Enjoyed great food but enjoyed even better service. Thank you Vijay.

I love this place; it always feels and tastes like home. The dosa is always crispy, the saambar and chutney just the right amount of tangy and spicy. The desserts are mouth watering. I tend to go here for some comfort food because it tastes just like mom's cooking. Coupled  with the fact that Vijay treats everyone like family, I want for nothing when I'm here.
Amazing food, and Vijay was super friendly and helpful. Love this place!
Really great! Vijay was very friendly and attentive! Will come again!

I really like the food but the service is not good. Servers are always in hurry to kick you out of the place and they are not coordinated well among themselves. If you can ignore the bad service, food is good!
Had a really delicious meal tonight for my mother’s birthday dinner! The food is always excellent and Vijay is a great server and is so friendly and welcoming!!
Amazing service by Vijay. Tasty food. 100% recommend
Great service from Vijay. Great food tasted and was fast service. Would visit again.
Great place and great food. The uthappams were really good. Vijay is very friendly and helpful with great suggestions. They are open to customizing existing food options.
I had an amazing experience at the restaurant.High quality south Indian food couple with excellent service. Vijay was our server. His service was brilliant.

Their food is really amazing and customer service is more amazing specifically
Mr Vijay.

Stopped in for a quick meal while on a restricted diet and away from home.  Vijay took such great care.  The food was great, I got what I needed, and he threw in a sweet lassi.  That is the traditional Indian way: to look after guests, and I am very grateful for such consideration.  Will be back for sure!

Great food and great price. I always get the veggie dosa or the parotta. The dosas are perfectly made - crispy and chewy and the chutneys are made just right. Vijay provides impeccable service and makes sure everything is perfect.

Amazing food! The taste is an explosion of flavors on your mouth. Ask for the basmati Tea.
The attention is good. Thanks Vijay!
Good food. Our server Mr. Vijay was very energetic and quick to attend to our orders
Delicious food!! Love coming to this restaurant! Vijay is a great server!

He made us feel at home and made sure our vadas were super fresh, hot and crispy. I recommend this place 100% and will definitely come back the next time we are in NY.
All meals are vegetarian. Variety of choises. Quick service. Nice waiters.

This particular visit was quite entertaining as we were greeted by this friendly waiter, Vijay. Good food, good chat makes up the best Sunday brunch :)
Best dosa in NYC!! Bhaturas are also super size here. Excellent ambience and service!
Just recently celebrated my birthday here, really wonderful staff especially the host vijay  was really wonderful

This was the best experience ever, my friend recommended this and we had a great time! Vijay was a great host and recommend the best dishes !
5 star everything. !!!! Thank you
Visited for lunch.  The dosa are amazing.  Also had the fried plantains as a starter.  Excellent.  Very friendly and knowledgeable servers.   Great service.
Amazing food. Vijay was really friendly. Definitely coming back with some more friends. Loved it!
The food was excellent and our waiter(Vijay) did a marvelous job. Highly recommend

Great food quality. Only one attendant who also does cleaning and serving very calmly. Small place. Very crowded. Waiting time at 1.30 around 15 to 20 minutes.    Service was quite fast. If you are looking for authentic south indian food in NY, best place to visit. We enjoyed the food.
My wife and I had a great time eating dinner here. The thali reminds me of the thali I used to eat at woodlands hotel in Chennai. Our server Vijay was very friendly and helpful.
Delicious vegetarian food - the dosas are a standout, very crispy and light. Vijay was a charming & attentive waiter.
Very good comfort food. Makes you feel right at home. Excellent service by Mr. Vijay.
Good South Indian food options. Vegetarian options only. Highly recommend
Vijay was a great. Very good food, cant recommend it enough
Food really hit the spot. The Thali had more variety than the Lexington branch. Our server, Vijay was very friendly and made the whole experience very memorable. Will highly recommend him.
Great food and good value! The staff was very accommodating and helpful, especially Vijay. Great service and food, definitely coming back here!
Food was amazing at this place, staff (vijay) was friendly too. Being here felt like home
Amazing dosas, good amount of spice. The service from Vijay was fantastic, took care of our big table, recommended the best dishes and brought everything on time. Would come again!

Very poor service with extremely rude waiters.
People ask to be served water to them after waiting fo 20 mins.
They think memorizing a customer’s order is the best way to take it which they would obviously forget after 5 mins and don’t care to serve it thereafter. We observed a “seamless” delivery guy waiting for 50 mins to get his order. Every waiter completely ignored this guy.
The manager was really rude with a complete lack of customer service knowledge. He was literally yelling at people waiting to give orders.
I wont ever visit this place because the food was not worth this nuisance.
Great service by Vijay.. Best place for authentic Indian food. Must visit.
Always love this place. Vijay is very helpful and courteous. He went out of his way to help me prepare my take out. Thanks Vijay. Will be sure to come back soon.

Great south indian food. Our server - Vijay was extremely friendly and he provided wonderful service. I will definitely visit again because of Mr. Vijay's delightful service. They have restaurants all over the world in many countries such as Germany, Hong Kong, UAE etc. In the US, they are in New York, New Jersey, Texas and California.
Lackluster service. Food is ok. Adyar Ananda Bhavan is a better option.
Food was delicious!!! Vijay was our host and he was excellent! He was very fun and entertaining!!

Awesome awesome restaurant. Everything was great!!! Order anything and you will be satisfied

Vijay gave us great service!!!

Super yummy, everything's made perfectly and service was super fast for lunch.  Our server Vijay was awesome and very polite.  All vegetarian, it was so nice to be able to choose from an entire menu for once!
Great food. If you go there, ask for Vijay. The service is fantastic and they are super kind.
The food was really good and our server Vijay was awesome!
Best Dosa and sambar we had ever had! We ordered Onion Chilli Masala Dosa, Aloo Paratha, and Chai. Everything was great.
Great masala dosa and South Indian coffee!! Our server (Vijay) was super sweet and helpful, had a great dinner!!
Amazing food, even better service! Vijay was a great host and helped us make the choices in a fairy large offering.
Small dining area and wait time will be there.. only 2 staffs in floor so we it takes time get seated. Food is authentic south Indian and tastes good

Thank you Vijay! Great experience! Great food. Definitely will be back.
Fantastic food and fantastic service! Vijay is the best waiter there is. Definitely will be back.

This is my second time visiting the restaurant, and I returned as a very happy customer yet again!
The dosas are amazing, just the way we would expect them to be at home, and the service is even better. Vijay always makes us feel welcome and at home. Having meals here is an incredibly comforting and satisfying experience.

Literally everywhere in the world, Saravanaa Bhavan is where I can find fantastic, authentic, South Indian food. We had ghee and rava dosas that were excellent. The pav bhaji was fantastic too. Don't miss the filter coffee made Chennai-style, served with milk in a steel tumbler. Special thanks to the hilarious Mr Vijay, who was such a cool guy!
Vijay was awesome and helped me and my friends 5 star
Saravana Bhavan was very yummy! Vijay was very kind and helped us choose food. Thank you! I came with my friend from Korea. We will return again!
Excellent place for South Indian fare and vegetarian meals! Really helpful staff and amazing service by Vijay also.
Great dosa and idlis, but it was Vijay, and his most warm welcome that made this a memorable experience. Thanks Vijay! :-)
Thanks for to Vijay Anna for an awesome dining experience! :D

This is my go-to place for food that reminds me of home! The weekend thali is as good as anything you might get served during a Tamil wedding feast. The staff is friendly too, ask for Vijay!

I'm a longtime customer and will return as long as this place stays open.
Great place for authentic south indian food. Vijay, our server, was super nice and made sure we had a good experience.
Amazing food and services. Vishal was especially a very nice and patient
Vijay is the best!  Dosa, Idli, Batura - everything hit the spot!

Awesome food, good service n Vijay is the best host , he is too gud to serve n take proper care .must visit if u r a South Indian food liver, there paper dosa, filter coffee n rava kesri is worth to enjoy.keep it up..

One doesn’t need to write a review for Sravana Bhavan but I am writing this to talk abt the quality of service. Our waiter Vijay was very friendly and made sure our orders were accurate and served timely. Special thanks to him for the awesome filter coffee! Definitely coming back.

Very amicable atmosphere. The dosa was amazing, and you need not ask about South Indian dessert AND you haven't eaten in HSB if you did not have the MADRAS FILTER COFFEE!! :D
Prompt and very friendly service by Mr.Vijay!! It sure feels awesome to communicate in mother tongue, Tamil..!!
Thanks for making my first day in NYC awesome!
Happy stomach, happy life! :)
Definitely a go to in NYC!!!
My first in this restaurant. The service was great and the food was amazing. I definitely recommend it
Very Good service and tasty food. Ambient atmosphere and easy to get to.
Very good food and Vijay is very friendly and awesome !

Vijay Anna is the kesari baath side to the authentic and finger licking South Indian comfort food that makes me feel like I'm home away from home.
A must visit to anyone in NYC and wants a taste of India.
The food here is great! Really authentic & the staff is very friendly, especially Vijay. Excellent service!
The food quality is on an downward spiral. They were great , but off late the place hasn’t been able to keep up with its food quality.
I had the Kara Dosa and it definitely lived up to its name. Ask for Vijay, his candor and bubbly nature kept us entertained throughout!
Great experience, yummy food! You won’t regret this experience, it is not only for the vegetarians but anyone looking for some authentic Indian food! Vijay was our awesome waiter!
One of the best Indian food experiences in NYC! Great food, great service! Thank you Vijay!
Great food. Super friendly staff. I loved my Palak Paneer!
Great food as always! Very welcoming staff. Highly recommend getting Dosa.
Amazing food. Ravi our server was very good. Delicious Dosas and Mango Lassi =) My Favorite in the city.
Excellent Dosas! Great service from Vijay! Nothing like it!

Thanks to Vijay ji for the lovely hospitality and the smile on his face.
Food is always good and refreshing with the bomb of flavours

Coming from Switzerland and had my 1st experience in a Saravanaa Bhavan. What to say?! Excellent food, excellent place and excellent service!!! Vijay was sooo friendly and still professional. We loved his service at most.
Really good food and excellent service from Vijay! Highly recommend
We absolutely loved the food! Vijay was amazing and so kind! I would absolutely recommend this restaurant to everyone! :)
Vijay was terrific, he was our server and very lovely. The food is delicious and authentic and fresh, and I’ll be coming back.
South Indian Thaali is a must try in this restaurant. Don’t forget to say hi to Vijay there. Very friendly and good human being. You will enjoy his company.

these guys are the best and the chai is off the hook!!!

Tell Vijay i sent ‘cha!

🔥😋👍
great food and service, and our server vijay was nice and helpful
Such a wonderful restaurant! Great service from Vijay, highly recommend for a birthday experience - beautiful food and amazing service.

The service was really nice from the staff, such as Mr. Vijay, and the food was great.

Planning our NYC trip without visiting Saravanaa Bhavan is a no brainer.With Vijay as our server, we were welcomed like family.The food was delicious and brought back nostalgia!Would always suggest to visit again when in NYC to get quality, delicious Indian food!
The food was quickly served and delicious. We seated promptly, and Vijay and the rest of the staff were very kind.

What a delightful size of dosa. Come here just to see the dosa architecture! I made an exception for a small to-go single-use wrapper so that I could save every bite. Definitely straight out of SE Asia and some excellent chutneys. The Mysore (spicy) dosa warmed me up on a cold day and could even have been hotter. Thank you Lincoln and the team.

He doesn’t know how to talk to customers. Also, he served burnt dosa (see the pic attached). Stay away from this place. Other sarvaana bhawans are far better in terms of food, service and seating.

In my list of worth it places; Saravana Bhavan is the No.1, I could wait in line hours if I had to, in order to get my delicious south indian delicacies, because it is thaaaaaaat WORTH IT!! I can guarantee the freshness of each and every dishes presented in HSB, it is made with so much passion and dedication; and this reflects everytime you order a dish you will get the same promising flavor EVERTIME!! that shows how consistent the staff are which is a absolute plus. Amongst all the mouth watering dishes my favourite are Onion Rava Masala Dosa and 3pc Idly; I am telling you these two together never can go wrong. I have been to all three location and the variety of service is commendable. I could see the hardwork put by the new management, yup!! The management changed. Overall, very enticing (in a good way) 😌 NO.1 🥇

The worst of all the Saravana Bhavans that I had visited. Saravana Bhavan is very very prominent in India for its healthy food and its rich taste. On the contrary, this franchise particularly is offering very cheap quality of food.
We ordered Idly and vada along with Mysore Bonda . I don't know about the age of the batters but I am confident they are too old!! Both idly and vada tasted sour, which they shouldn't be. The 3 chutneys they offered are all very sour. They are very cold that it seems they were kept in the fridge for so long time. Sambar is okay. Mysore Bonda is of no difference.  The name itself is Mysore Bonda but they offered someother dish which is made of Vada batter.
Don't even know what these people are making customers to eat. I am afraid that if someone who are new to Indian food tastes this, they don't even like to eat Indian food again. Franchises like these are spoiling the rich heritage of Saravana Bhavan and hence India.
The only positive thing is the customer service. But that will not at all compensate what we go for to "SARAVANA BHAVAN".  I will happily give a negative 10 rating if its possible and never ever suggest anyone to go to this place to eat.

Saravanaa Bhavan is my comfort place in NY! Authentic South Indian food and the best service ever. Special mention for Vijay who is always so attentive and happy to serve! Try their South Indian thali meal and of course dosas and idlis!

This place is going to be my new go to spot in North Manhattan, not for Indian food, but for ANY food. I had a mysore masala dosa, salted lassi, and a half cup of madras coffee.

The dosa was cooked to perfection: a great crisp, but still soft in the middle. If you like the dry heat of chutney powder, aka gunpowder, this is the best mysore style dosa I've had. The chutney powder was a nice thick paste rather than just sprinkled as an afterthought by many restaurants.

The salted lassi is simple, and refreshing, great for a hot day like today.

I wasn't quite certain what the controversy was about when I gave Magnolia Bakery a consideration as I personally found its cupcakes to be bland, flavourless, and oh so quite boring. But I do not think it is their cupcakes to boast about, I felt my tastebuds completely in awe when my eyes swept over their cake tiers and noticed their ever so famous peanut butter and jelly cake, a classic rendition of a childhood favourite. The peanut butter cake is absolutely moist with layers of grape jelly inside and frosted generously with peanut butter confection. This cake is one to be eaten immediately as I noticed the cake will become stale the following day. Another signature favourite is the classic magic bar, so big and sticky, I can never pass one of these up!

But my leading reason to why I am reviewing this Magnolia Bakery is for the gracious service we received from one of the baking girls. When my companion ordered an iced skim milk latte, the young woman who assisted us, a slightly heavyset young African American girl, accidentally used whole milk instead. When my companion stuck the straw into the drink, she screamed and immediately grabbed the drink out of his hand and tossed it out because she was under the impression that he was allergic to milk! Her concern over making a new drink for him was a kind touch [even though he did order skim milk instead], but a simple customer service like that can give an establishment a good name x
